entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
